item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello World! I’ve tried to start this blog other times, but it never got good enough and I soon gave up. I’m very critical of myself and I charge myself a lot for the quality of the things I do. And that made me procrastinate on this project for a few years, and this time I’m going to start with the basics and continually improve. Being here today talking about this has 3 motivators that I will talk a little about each one.
